TunableList.name: default_behaviors
TunableList.description: The default club rules associated with this assignment. These can be replaced by tuning the optional tunable in a given CustomSchedulePreset's Time Slot Assignment.

TunableVariant.name: default_outfit
TunableVariant.description: The outfit used for this Assignment. If No Outfit is specified, then no outfit change will be applied.

TunableTuple.name: no_outfit
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will not make any changes to the default outfit for the assignment.

TunableTuple.name: outfit_category
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will force an outfit category. If the assignment's default outfit setting is 'Uniform', it will use the uniform's outfit category.

TunableTuple.name: style_and_color
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will force a generated outfit based on tuned Style and Color tags.

TunableVariant.name: color
TunableVariant.description: The desired color tag for the outfit.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: A color tag used to find matching CAS parts.

TunableVariant.name: style
TunableVariant.description: The desired style tag for the outfit.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: A style tag used to find matching CAS parts.

TunableTuple.name: uniform
TunableTuple.description: If selected, the CustomScheduleAssignment will utilize a full assortment of outfits with optional overrides for each category.

TunableVariant.name: feminine_adult
TunableVariant.description: A uniform for feminine TYAE in this time slot.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A uniform for feminine TYAE in this time slot.

TunableVariant.name: feminine_child
TunableVariant.description: A uniform for feminine children in this time slot.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A uniform for feminine children in this time slot.

TunableVariant.name: masculine_adult
TunableVariant.description: A uniform for masculine TYAE in this time slot.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A uniform for masculine TYAE in this time slot.

TunableVariant.name: masculine_child
TunableVariant.description: A uniform for masculine children in this time slot.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A uniform for masculine children in this time slot.

Tunable.name: sim_count
Tunable.description: The default number of sims required for this assignment.

TunableList.name: sim_criteria
TunableList.description: A set of criteria that all sims in this assignment must pass to be eligible.

TunableList.name: ages
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must be one of the specified ages.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: careers
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these Careers.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: fame_rank_requirements
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the Sim must have a fame rank that has been selected.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableEnum.name: gender
TunableEnum.description: Gender a Sim must have in order to pass this criteria.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these Traits.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: regions
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must be from one of these worlds.

TunableEnum.name: relationship_status
TunableEnum.description: Relationship status a Sim must have in order to pass this criteria.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: skills
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these skills with a skill level of at least the value specified in MINIMUM_CRITERIA_SKILL_LEVEL.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these Traits.

Tunable.name: criteria_required
Tunable.description: Check if you want the criterion to be required for sims in this CustomScheduleAssignment.
